info.title: Liferay Commerce Admin Account API
info.description: Liferay Commerce Admin Account API. A Java client JAR is available for use with the group ID 'com.liferay', artifact ID 'com.liferay.headless.commerce.admin.account.client', and version '4.0.41'.

description.example: right stairs, first room on the left

AccountAddress.example: [{city=Diamond Bar, countryISOCode=US, defaultBilling=true, defaultShipping=true, description=right stairs, first room on the left, id=31130, latitude=33.9976884, longitude=-117.8144595, name=Alessio Antonio Rendina, phoneNumber=(123) 456 7890, regionISOCode=CA, street1=1400 Montefino Ave, street2=1st floor, street3=suite 200, zip=91765}]

accountRoles.example: [{description={en_US=Account Administrator Description US, hr_HR=Account Administrator Description HR, hu_HU=Account Administrator Description HU}}, {description={en_US=Order Manager Description US, hr_HR=Order Manager Description HR, hu_HU=Order Manager Description HU}}]

AccountMember.example: [{description={en_US=Account Administrator Description US, hr_HR=Account Administrator Description HR, hu_HU=Account Administrator Description HU}}, {id=31256, name=Alessio Antonio Rendina, roles=null}]

additionalProperties.example: {en_US=Role Description US, hr_HR=Role Description HR, hu_HU=Role Description HU}

description.example: {en_US=Role Description US, hr_HR=Role Description HR, hu_HU=Role Description HU}

additionalProperties.example: {en_US=Role Title US, hr_HR=Role Title HR, hu_HU=Role Title HU}

title.example: {en_US=Role Title US, hr_HR=Role Title HR, hu_HU=Role Title HU}

accountMembers.example: [{description={en_US=Account Administrator Description US, hr_HR=Account Administrator Description HR, hu_HU=Account Administrator Description HU}}, {id=31256, name=Alessio Antonio Rendina, roles=null}]

dateModified.description: The account's most recent modification date.
